item.description:
The 5K begins on Hartford Avenue in front of the Solomon Welles House.

The 5K course follows Hartford Avenue to Garden Street to the Broad Street Green. A quick loop around the Broad Street Green onto Broad Street turns right onto Marsh Street and left onto Hart Street.

From Hart Street take a right onto Main Street and enter the Wethersfield Cove. The finish is on the path from the cove to the Solomon Welles House.

The course is accurately measured but not certified. The run is scenic and flat on good road pavement (except for a 100 yard section of grass by the cove).

Course Map: Old Wethersfield 5K (pending)

Information on 10K course is pending.

Directions
Take I-91 to Exit 26 (Old Wethersfield).
Follow signs to Department of Motor Vehicles.

Parking
Park in Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) parking lot
at 60 State Street, Wethersfield.
item.name: 5K Road Race and 5K Family Walk
